name: Premium Card Processing
description: Specialized workflow for premium credit card applications
content:
rule "Premium Card Processing":
    if applicant.annualIncome >= 100000 and applicant.creditScore >= 750 then
        instantApproval, assignPremiumBenefits, "send platinum welcome package"
    if applicant.creditScore >= 700 and applicant.employmentStatus == "employed" then
        approveApplication, "assign standard benefits"
    else "Standard Application Workflow"
